Ingredients.1: 1  red bell pepper, sliced into thin strips

Ingredients.2: 1  green bell pepper, sliced into thin strips

Ingredients.3: 1 large onion, sliced into thin strips

Ingredients.7: 12 ounces raw large shrimp, peeled and deveined

Directions.1: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate.

Directions.2: Place bell pepper strips, onion, and jalapeno slices in a large bowl. Add 2 teaspoons of fajita seasoning and olive oil. Stir until evenly combined.

Directions.3: Place shrimp in a separate bowl. Add remaining 1/2 teaspoon fajita seasoning and lime juice. Gently stir until evenly combined.

Directions.4: Place vegetable mixture in a grill basket. Grill for 10 minutes. Stir in shrimp and grill for 5 minutes more. Remove basket from the grill.

Directions.5: Place tortillas on the grill and toast for 2 minutes. Divide filling between the tortillas and serve.
